scripts.install-deps: npm install && cd frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../backend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.build: npm run install-deps && npm run build-frontend
scripts.postbuild: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const dir='frontend/dist';if(!fs.existsSync(dir)||!fs.existsSync(path.join(dir,'index.html'))){console.error('Build failed - frontend files missing');process.exit(1)}console.log('Build verified')"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev"
